name: explicatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in way that provides or relates to an explanation: I thought it would be helpful to talk more fully and explicatively about my work. Mathematical models may sometimes be explicatively effective. Synonym
explanatorilyRelated words
explicative
explicate
More examplesFewer examples"I found it in the kitchen", he added explicatively.He presents the problem explicatively at the start of the book.I will try to state the details more explicatively.Her hypothesis is explicatively strong, and clearly presented.They use their knowledge explicatively for problem solving in groups.
